answers.answer: Have you been to a doctor? I don't know much about diabetes but type 2 uncontrolled can lead to sudden weight loss if it's getting worse. If you haven't already get to a doctor. Could also be hyperthyroidism.

question: I've had type 2 diabetes for years and it is uncontrollable.  Usually runs 500 when fasting.   I'm now undergoing massive weight loss without trying no matter what i eat i still loose weight.  I've lost 50 lbs in the last 6 months and now I'm noticing stuff in my urine any suggestions?
title: falling apart at the seems
